TopicTitle: hai, I ish new to these forums

Articles.Content:
Hai, I'm new to these forums. I've been playing KSP since the early days however (before the removal of the original Mk1 command pod). I forget exactly which version I started playing in however (so it might not have been THAT early, not sure; all I know is the original command pod was still in the game at this point and it was before the improved orbital map, and well before maneuvers and such). I just finally got around to making an account on the forums. I need to start getting back into space, more recently I've been playing with the best sub-orbital jet I've ever built: Me at the north pole Me on the way to the north pole (I've also made the ship downloadable in case anyone wants to try it out: http://zukaro-travon.deviantart.com/art/Red-Fox-One-Download-379489476)

Edited September 14, 2013 by Zukaro Travon
